item.title: ansible基础学习
item.description: 基本连接命令 1 2 ansible -i ./hosts --connection=local local -m ping ansible -i ./hosts remote -v -m ping -u root --private-key=~/.ssh/id_rsa 角色相关 1 2 3 4 5 ansible-galaxy init roles/mysql # 安装别人写好的roles：(galaxy.ansible.com
